lead_paragraph: Prized Golden State acquisition Kevin Durant should not try to become the team leader at his new home, says Hall of Famer Gary Payton.

headline.main: Durant Should Accept Spot Down Warriors' Pecking Order: Payton
headline.print_headline: Durant Should Accept Spot Down Warriors' Pecking Order: Payton

snippet: Prized Golden State acquisition Kevin Durant should not try to become the team leader at his new home, says Hall of Famer Gary Payton....
